entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
